browsermonkey.render
Class DocumentPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  browsermonkey.render.DocumentPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class DocumentPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A GUI component for laying out the JComponents to render a DocumentNode tree.

See Also:
Serialized Form

setSearch

public void setSearch(java.lang.String term)
Used to perform searches on a page. Searches the page for a supplied term then highlights all instances of that term on the page and reloads it to show the highlights. Updates the foundStatus variable to allow output if no items could be found.

Parameters:
term - Term to be searched for as a string.
